name: Hutt Influence
Lore: 'Jabba''s criminal empire extends to all reaches of the Outer Rim.',
Text: 'Deploy on table. Opponent may not cancel or modify Force drains at each Tatooine battleground site where you have two aliens with different card titles. Also, attrition against you is reduced by 2 when two of your nonunique aliens with different card titles are in battle.',
